summary: The module provides a suite of unit tests that validate the ability to export various NeMo speech recognition models—including CTC, RNNT, classification, and speaker labeling architectures—to ONNX format, checking for correct handling of adapters, numba dependencies, and model integrity after export.
business_intent: Guarantee that speech AI models can be reliably converted and deployed in production environments by confirming export compatibility and runtime correctness across different model types.
